creator: PuzCharm
descriptionHtml:
お好きな武器を選んで、先生や学長のモニタリングを避けて、隣のクラスメイトといっぱいからかい合おう！プライドに関する手の速さの試練、競争がお好きなあなたには最適！

ゲーム特徴：
★面白い対戦、機敏も勇気も
★短時間で速いペース
★リアクションの試練
★速さのテスト
★世界中で相手マッチング
★迫力のある効果音

遊び方：
★ゲームが始まる前にお好きな武器やキャラとプロフィールを選ぶこと
★ゲームが始まるとボタンを押して相手をからかうこと。毎回１ポイント。
★たまに振り返る先生と見回りの学長にご注意。からかい続けると怒られて罰として立たせられること。
★向こうが怒られる時、こっちはボタンを押して含み笑いが可能。相手はプライドが打撃された結果として、ポイントも下回ること。
★時間切れになると、ポイントがより高いほうが勝ちと認めること。

果たして嫌がる失敗か意気揚々たる勝利か？ご活躍を！
descriptionShort: Fight against people all over the world, fight masters, test reaction and speed
title: 隣バトル：二人で遊べるリアルタイム対戦ゲーム

creator: PuzCharm
descriptionHtml:
In the game, two players will play a role as the opponent's deskmate, taking advantage of the moment when the teacher turns his head to write on the blackboard, a hand-speed battle involving dignity is carried out. During the entire confrontation, the player must not only do their best to burst out hand speed, but also always be careful of the teacher inadvertently turning back and the sudden appearance of the principal outside the window.

Game Features:
★ Interesting scene setting
★ Short time and fast pace
★ Reflex test
★ Speed test
★ Match opponents from all over the world
★ Contagious sound effects

How to Play:
★ Choose your favorite weapon, character and class before the game starts
★ At the beginning of the game, press the button to gloat at your opponent, which adds 1 point each time.
★ Beware of the teacher who keeps looking over his shoulder and the principal who keeps looking around. If you continue to gloat, you will be punished.
★ When the opponent is angry, you can press the button to gloat, and he will also lose points as a result.
★ When the time runs out, the player with higher points wins.

The loser or the winner, it's too close to call.
This is a battle for hand speed, reflexes and brain power. Are you ready? Good luck!
descriptionShort: Come and test whether your hand speed and reflexes are the global leader!

title: Class.io:A Two-player Game

creator: PuzCharm
descriptionHtml:
Arcade & Coin-Op Games Play Now! Get ready for head-to-head Arcade & Coin-Op Games action in the new retro classic - Class.io! 🕹️ Join action-packed arcade games fans in this thrilling fast-paced coin-op game with you arcade & coin-op games and old school arcade game fan friends!
In this crazily addictive 2-player arcade & coin-op game, go head-to-head against high-scores challengers worldwide in frenetic retro classroom. 👩🏫👨🏫 Set in a cartoonish school, outscore your opponents by tapping buttons madly to rack up high scores and coin-op. 👆👇
In the arcade & coin-op game, you and the other high-scores player will play a role as each other's deskmate. As soon as the teacher turns his/her head to write on the blackboard, it's time for you to take advantage of the moment and carry out a hand-speed battle! ⏱️
Do your best to burst out hand speed 🕹️ for fast-paced arcade game battle! But also always be careful of the teacher inadvertently turning back! 👩🏫 And watch out! Is that the principal staring at you outside the window all out of blue? 👨🏫 Just watch for the stern teacher and patrolling principal or you'll get busted and docked and may lose high scores! 👩🏫
Class.io Arcade Game Features:
★ Fun scene setting makes you laugh! 😂
★ Short play time and fast pace, easy to pick up! ⏱️
★ Reflex test, challenging your lightning-fast reflexes! ⚡
★ Speed test, featuring new modes, power-ups and more! 🎮
★ Match other players from all over the world! 🌏
★ Hilarious sound effects, just share with your friends! 😆
How to Win Hand-Speed Battle:
★ Choose your favorite weapon, character and class before the game starts. 🏫
★ At the beginning of the game, press the button to gloat at your opponent, which adds 1 coin point each time. 👍
★ Beware of the teacher who keeps looking over his shoulder and the principal who keeps looking around. 👀 If you continue to gloat, you will be punished. ❌
★ If the opponent gets mad, you can press the button to gloat, and he/she will also lose coin points as a result. 😠
★ When the time runs out, the player with higher coin points wins. 🥇
With simple, intuitive controls and quick-fire rounds, Class.io is perfect for killing time or competing for bragging rights. ⏱️ Can your lightning-fast reflexes top the global leaderboards? 🏆Compete for high scores and unique power-ups to spice up your arcade game. There's always something new to try! 🆕
Class.io captures the spirit of old-school arcade game fun, upgraded with modern touches like weekly events with exclusive character skins. 🕹️Customize your avatar, desk and more to show your personality. With different game modes, power-ups and levels, there's always new arcade game challenges! 💪
Looking for old-school arcade gaming action? Relive the competition of arcade game classic Class.io! Download now and accept the challenge to become action-packed arcade games classroom champion! 🥇Enjoy Class.io's coin-op action and challenging arcade game fun wherever you go! 📲
descriptionShort: Test your reflexes, win arcade games for highest scores and top global boards!
